'''Duelblaze''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Stretchy Pyro Fungus''' that appears in the [[Fungus Mechanicus]] event.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats
|hide_notes = 1

|pyro_res   = 20%
|dendro_res = 20%

|hp_ratio  = 2.25
|hp_type   = 2
|atk_ratio = 4.32
|atk_type  = 2
}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Stretchy Pyro Fungus

|name_1      = Skill: Explosive Embers
|desc_1      = Deploys Explosive Embers at the target location, dealing '''1000% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} to nearby opponents upon explosion. 
|file_1      = Stretchy Pyro Fungus Explosive Embers

|name_2      = Flaming Breath
|desc_2      = Unleashes cone-shaped flames, dealing '''200% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} to opponents hit.

|name_3      = Raging Flames
|desc_3      = Gains a '''10%''' [[ATK]] boost with each '''Flaming Breath''' performed, for a max of 5 stacks. The ATK boost effect will be removed after a skill is used. 
}}
